mapper.insert: insert into earnings(moneybook_name, price, cartegory, insert_date, moneybook_type) values(#{moneybook_name}, #{price}, #{cartegory}, #{insert_date}, #{moneybook_type})
mapper.select: select price, cartegory, insert_date, ino from earnings where insert_date like CONCAT('%',#{insert_date},'%') and moneybook_name = #{moneybook_name} order by insert_date desc, ino desc
